parse.title: Troll shaman (Davendale)
parse.text:
Troll shaman (Davendale) was removed after an update.
The contents of this page no longer exist in RuneScape, and this article is kept for historical purposes.

Troll shamans were monsters that were fought during the Davendale Tutorial.

Drops[edit | edit source]

This section is a stub. You can help by expanding it.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • hidden 24 May 2021 (Update):
    • Removed from game.
  • hidden 26 April 2021 (Update):
    • Its maximum magic hit has been changed from 100 to 72.
  • hidden 22 February 2021 (Update):
    • Added to game.
